Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, Great price, Fast Printer, Eprint
Cons: Needs a duplexer or a sheet feeder.
I purchased this printer while it was on sale, I have been a happy camper ever since!! I primarily print black so I am not too concerned with the Tri-Color print cart. but if you do I would recommend stepping up to a model that has the three colors split out. I have been reallly impressed with the E-Print feature. I even found an app on my phone HP iPrint Photo that lets me print my pictures to all the printers in my house as long as im on wifi. Print speeds on draft mode are super quick! Almost have to stand there and catch them as they shoot out. Also I found that the XL cart, gives you the most for your money!
Overall, VERY HAPPY! Thank you HP you done it again! Great p ... roduct. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to set up, great price, quiet, fast, quality photos
Cons: a little bulky, but aren't they all?
I look at all of the bad reviews before the good ones so I was really hesitant to get this printer after some of the things people said. I decided that, for the price, I should just take a chance and I'm really glad I did.
PROS This printer is super easy to set up. The printer itself walks you through everything, step by step. I've never set up a wireless printer before or installed an ink cartridge in years but it took less than ten minutes to set up and test everything. The printer even walks you through testing your wireless network setup and test printing on sample photo paper to make sure it prints photos okay. The photos turned out great.
It prints ... really fast. I have my printer on a shelf and whenever I click print, I have to bolt to the printer to grab the paper before it flops to the floor because it prints so fast. It even prints photos fast and the colors turned out nice.
It prints quietly. It could be quieter I guess but I don't have a problem with the noise at all. I have a dog who barks at any little noise and even he isn't bothered by it.
The HP website that you can sign up for is a little nifty, too. You can set up an e-mail address for the printer so you can e-mail things directly to your printer from anywhere. I haven't tested it yet but I like that the option is there. You can also set it up to accept only certain e-mail addresses so random people can't print to your printer if they know the address.
You can download the drivers online (as with most products) so I never even bothered with the disc. I have two netbooks that I print from without any problems.
CONS I haven't really seen any cons yet. I've had it for about a month and the ink is still good after printing a few photos, recipes, directions, etc. It's quiet and simple to set up and use. For the price, you really can't beat what you're getting here.
I recommend this for anyone - those who are computer savvy and also those who aren't. My fiance was surprised that I could set it up o ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact, light, crisp colors, easy setup
Cons: No option on device to connect laptop/PC with 2.0 USB...only 3.0
What a bargain. I was sceptical about this all in one wireless device but it didn't disappoint. If you're going to be doing a lot of heavy printing it's probably not the printer that's going to make you happy. However, with 1 to 5 pages at a time it's great. The color copies I've made are almost better than the originals. PDF documents come out beautiful, crisp and clear...no fuzzy lines.
The scan to PC or laptop function works better than advertised. Open the desktop application, hit the "Scan" button and you're good to go. Nothing complicated about that. It's quick too.
I bought this all in one for $70 plus tax. For the light printing and copyi ... ng I do, it works for me. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I got this mainly for wifi photo from iphone, itouch. The wifi was easy to setup and get working and prints text ok. Photo quality is poorest I've seen in all the color printers I've owned. Colors all washed out, not true in color. I compared same print with another printer and Walmart and this printer is just a joke and will throw it away or return it tomorrow. The printer does not include fax for this price where others like canon, etc. include fax for same cost and have superior print quality. I wouldn't pay $10 for this piece of junk.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: AirPrint, size
Cons: Company security settings
Bought this to replace an OLD HP. Used mostly for business in home office on small desk. Nice small footprint and all-in-one works perfect for my low-medium volume.
Looking for easy wireless printing which I both did and did not receive.
iPad airPrint is a breeze. No setup needed, and easy to do.
Unfortunately I am having issues with my Lenovo work laptop connecting wirelessly because of the VPN/firewall security.
Overall good printer. Fast, clear, easy UI for scanning and copying whether from printer touch screen or driver software.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: First off, this printer is not the fastest, highest quality product you could buy. However, considering the price point and all the goodies, its very, very good. Print speed and quality are excellent and the wireless connectivity and HP's app makes it super easy to print documents and photos from my phone. All in all, very good product.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
After shopping the HP website, I called their store and explained I needed a light-weight printer-scanner-copier to take with me to meetings where we are trying to identify ancestors in old photos. I scan the photos, enlarge them and print copies for everyone. I'd been lugging my 27-lb. all-in-one with me, but it was just too heavy. My customer service rep recommended the D110A, and it's perfect! Very easy for me to transport, with my bad back. Setup was easy and picture quality great. I hard-wire it to my laptop, so can't speak to wireless setup. My only issue was with sticky paper feed rollers, easily resolved by cleaning the rollers. HP customer support talked me through the procedure. Like anything, it's easy once you know how to do it!
I also have to commend HP for rethinking t ... he packaging. It came in a box with handles, wrapped in a reusable plastic mesh shopping bag, with the accessories in a separate zippered mesh bag. Only 1 plastic to protect the glass. Still styrofoam end pieces - those could be replaced by molded cardboard. Overall an excellent experience and well worth the modest price - I'll save that much in chiropractor bills alone. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Originally, I purchased a HP all-in-one C4750 wireless printer (on clerance for $29) at the local Office Depot. When I arrived home to set up the printer, everything went fine until the software prompted me to set up the wireless function- when I did, the control panel froze! Everything went downhill from that point so I ended up calling the HP troubleshooting hotline and I was on the phone with the customer service rep for 1.5 hrs. After the rep determined Office Depot sold me a "lemon", they (HP) offered me a e-gift card to purchase a brand new printer. How generous was THAT? So I read some reviews on printers in my price range and I ended up with the D110a. Got it yesterday and it took less then 10 minutes to set up. The printer is not heavy and easy to maneuver.... The wireless functio ... n didn't give me any problems to set up and it even prompted me to test out the product to make sure the settings were correct. I already scanned a gang of pictures and nothing "froze" on the panel while doing so. I ended up taking back the $29 printer and Office Depot didn't give me any lip (thank God). Net/Net- If someone is looking for an inexpensive pronter that has all-in-one features, I would choose this printer or something in the HP family. I am very pleased. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: quality of photos
Cons: cost of ink
After getting over the relatively confusing installation and setup, the printer is easy to use. Though I have not used all (or even very much) of its overall capabilities, it does produce high quality photos and works well for routine b&w printing. It does seem to use both of expensive color and b&w cartridges pretty quickly. I have printed less than 10 5x7 photos and it indicates about half used.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: fast; touch screen; quiet; Still works
The HP photosmart D110a printer is a great deal for your money but the ink is expensive. I really enjoy this printer though because it is easy to navigate with the touch screen. This printer has many options, without even being hooked up to a computer ours is wireless anyway you can print games like tic-tac-toe, soduko, and dot-to-dot. Also, you can print graph paper and choose the size of each box. You can also do many other things like plugging in a flash drive to print pictures, plug in a camera SD card, ect. this is such a great printer with quality prints and it has a black ink for the photo printing and a black ink for the normal printing. I think any one would be pleased with this printer. It also has a nice quick and quiet print a ... nd a fast shut-on, shut-off. It will scan to a thumb drive or sd card and it also does great copies with cool editing that you can do on it. I think it is worth the money and is a great buy for any house hold. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Wireless Connectivity with little flaw..
Item.Review:
Been buying Canons for about a decade now for home and business, avoiding HP's due to the same issues as mentioned from previous reviews, especially HP's document feeder and paper jam problems. However, I thought I'd give this model a try because of the price.
Pros: The built-in wireless print server is superb and easy to set up with my wireless N router! It eliminated one of my own Dlink Wireless G print server, which is a little complicated to set up. It's fast-printing, set up in "Fast" and grey scale to save on black ink. Great color screen and easy to understand.
Cons: The ePrint functionality does not work and is confusing. It says their server is down and could not connect. The intuitive screen is not as intuitive and slow to respond even when it's "enable fast browsin ... g". The lid that house the ink cartridge is so flimsy, a few times it tells me the lid is open. Lastly, the noise level of printing with this model is tolerable, however, my cheaper Canon iP2600 is quieter...and that's not even on "Quiet Mode", especially working at night.
I'll give HP the benefit of the doubt and try it. For now, I'll give HP 3 stars out of 5 because of few functionality and sub par design flaw. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Versatility and price!
Cons: Does not double-side print.
I bought this printer because it has wifi cabability and 4x6 photo printing. This printer does more than that and it was very easy to set up the wifi printing and eprint, which is a very cool tool. If you want a high quality all-in-one printer and dont wanna spent alot, this printer is for you. Photos print quality is just like going to get them printed at a photo dept.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: Difficulty is wireless connection and ink prices
I don't find anything extrodinary about this printer. Quality is average. I think ink prices are a bit high. It was rather difficult to setup the wireless connection

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great basic all in one printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Price and printer features and functionality
Cons: none
This thing does everything I need it too and ITS WIRELESS! Very easy to setup up. The only thing that's annoying is the frequent HP updates, which I should just turn off. The photo print is as good as at the stores also. Just make sure you get the Premium Photo papers.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Clean sleek design! I really like the functionality of this printer. It has good color capabilities considering the price. Easy to set up wirelessly as long as you know what you are doing. Drafts print fast, scanner works great, but I have not set up the address for the web print it will follow soon. I have had it one month and would recommend it.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: The printing options
Cons: SETUP!!!!!!!!!
This is a good printer with the ability to print from anywhere in the world. That said while the setup instructions say you can set this up on a network with WEP security don't bother. I ended up, after several hours, resetting my home network up as a WPA secured one (probably better I did that anyway). My real problem is though that the customer service rep was remoted on to my computer for over an hour and couldn't set it up correctly and never once suggested the option and neither do the instructions. If you buy this printer I hope you know how to set up your network security, if you do it's a great deal especially if you can get it at under 70 bucks.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Bought this product specifically for the AirPrint wireless capability. It works great...the setup was simple. Delivery was quick. For the price, ePrint and AirPrint make it a deal. The only thing that I have noticed, so far, is the slow printing speed.....but this is not a problem as this is used only for pesonal use at home (low-volume).

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I just updated from an old printer. I always wanted a wireless printer & one that would print photos well. It was easy to set up & I got 3 computers compatible to it now. I have done some printing, not on any on photo paper yet but everything looks good. It's so nice to be sitting with your laptop & need to print something out & with one click, printing. I like the design & front load paper feeder. It jammed once but it could of been my fault but it's designed to be able to get to the back & clear any jam with ease. I really do like this printer. And got it at the best price ever, packaged with the 17.3" HP laptop I also bought. Loving that too. :)

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great price, fast, easy, efficient
Cons: nothing
This printer was easy to setup and prints great. It is fast and efficient. We print from desktop, laptop, iphone and ipad. Works Great! We almost bought the upgraded version, but I am glad we didn't. This printer is exactly what we needed.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up wireless printing with laptop, good price.
Cons: Haven't found anything negative about this product.
I'm a college student and constantly needed assignments printed, this printer was on sale when I bought it and fit my budget perfectly... it prints fast, reasonable pricing for ink, small and lightweight and has touch screen capabilities. The printing quality is very good, the colors come out well. Would recommend this printer to everyone looking for a good printer on a budget!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, light and compact
Cons: Have had no issues with this printer
I previously had an Epson 610 Workstation that quit after a little more than a year. The two-year extended warranty was beneficial because it allowed me to get a store credit since Epson no longer makes the model. This printer is in the same price range but does not have the fax feature. It comes with starter ink-2 cartridges as opposed to 4 in the Epson which is better. This printer appears to be reliable and has been used to print moderate jobs. Paper feed is in the front instead of the back. It's compact , light and fits nicely near my Mac. It's easy to use with a touch screen, has wireless capability and user friendly with other wireless devices. It has been used to print school papers, ema ... ils and manuscript details without a problem. I spoke to several different sales people and all of them recommended HP as a reliable printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Easy to set up, great quality printing, and a low-cost companion to the iPad and iPhone. This is the lowest price printer available to print high quality photos and text from your iPad and iPhone using AirPrint. Works great with Macs, too. Key to set up is downloading the drivers directly from the web either through the HP.com support site or through an Apple Support Update. DO not use the hp cd included with the printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great price, Fast easy printing, wireless, crisp clear pictures,sleek design
Cons: nothing yet
I bought this printer for school and I love it. It prints photos so fast yet so clear. Also, it prints documents in under 5 seconds. Not to mention no wires at all.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: picture quality, affordable ink replacement & easy to use
Cons: nothing yet
Pictures are excellent quality, very easy to use. The price of the printer & replacement ink cartridges make it a great purchase! You won't be disappointed with this purchase.....we own 2!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy wireless; versatility
Cons: Paper tray has to stay open if loaded; Somewhat noisy
This was my first wireless printer, and the ease of setup and use was great. Had zero issues getting it to work with computers, router, etc. Extremely versatile in that you can place it pretty much anywhere (closet, etc.) you want so long as you have wi-fi and an electrical outlet. You can also print from anywhere in your home.
The print quality is very good for the price, and more than acceptable for general printing and non-pro photo printing. If you're looking for pro quality prints, you'll need to spend more $$$
Print speed about par with most other non-laser printers. NOTE: i don't use this printer for high volume printing, I have a B&W laser for that kind of th ... ing. Consequently, I cannot offer thoughts on printing more than 4 or 5 pages at a time.
Negatives: I'm not a huge fan of the paper tray. Wish you could load paper and shut the door--it would add a lot to the aesthetic and appearance. It's also a little noisy.
Overall, a lot of bells and whistles for not a lot of coin. A VERY good thing! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: value, speed, easy to install
Cons: -
I read the reviews before I made the purchase, and I was worried about the size of the ink cartridge. When I got it home it was very easy to install from the unit without having a printer cable, which I had read I'd need...I didn't need it! I saw the size cartridge and realized that for the money I spent, the full size cartridge would've increased the price, so I was okay with that. My old printer used the same size, and they were new, so that really worked out. I was suprised at the quality and speed from the new wireless unit, way better than my wired unit. Overall it was a super deal, and no regrets on the purchase! Highly recommended.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Air print
Cons: NA
Was easy to set up and aquired my wireless net work with no problems. Not the high end printer but does a good job, good quality, good print rate. Best feature is the the air print for the iphone or ipad. This is great. Print over wifi from them. Ink price looks good but is a small volume. Get the xl cartrages. End result pice of ink in line with most others. Just watch, there are different versions of this HP printer that look a like but only newer ones have air print.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup, good price, nice colors
Cons: paper output
I've had this for 1/2 hour now. Had to comment, set up was super easy. Harder to move the old printer.
But, this is on top of a credenza and the paper output has to be watched since the paper is spitting out and falling down.
The test color is amazing. bright and clear.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price & functions
Cons: Printing Speed.
I was a little skeptical, but I'm glad I purchased. This is a D110 version in case you see it elsewhere. It is iPad and Airprint compatible which I love. I use on my MAC. I didn't need to install any software or hard wires to the router. It was a simple WIFI setup and eprint as well. It's great from work I can print to this printer located in my home or when I'm on the road and need to print out emails or attachments.
A great price. Scanning can be saved to a PDF automatically and sent to an attached computer to the network or emailed.
The speed is ok, slow but acceptable. If you want to pay 2x the cost for a little quicker get the premium. That's the only difference I could see.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to setup, price, wireless support
Cons: nothing
I picked this printer for my kids to use with their laptops. The installation was a breeze. It connected directly to the wireless network on the first attempt. Each laptop connected via wireless on the first attempt, too.
Great quality printing for general printing and school projects. Tested the photo printing and was impressed, but suspect it will drain the color cartridge rather quickly.
Great printer for the price.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Print speed, quality, frequent paper jams
This may well be the worst printer I've ever purchased. I am very disappointed in its performance. I bought it on sale for $70 mostly because I wanted a wireless printer. My previous was a Cannon printer I'd had for quite a while and was still pleased with. I just wanted to switch to wireless. I was excited about it initially. This was not difficult to set up on my network, and the install on Mac and PC went fine, but it is EXTREMELY slow to print, it jams A LOT, the prints don't look very good, it has very small ink cartridges that I've seen go quickly, and the software for scanning is not very intuitive (the least of my complaints, but still a complaint). I realize for the price I shouldn't expect too much from i ... t, but I expect more than this. I've purchased many printers in the same price range and have been perfectly happy with them. I bought this for personal use at home. Right now I can't stand to use it. I would not recommend this printer to anyone. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price and setup was easy, Wireless
Cons: Nothing
Easy to set up, was able to set up multiple laptops within minutes. All features work great. It was exactly what I was looking for and for a great price. Wireless feature works great.
FYI: If you are not connected to a wireless network then you have to go out a buy a USB printer cord.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: fast; versatility
Cons: kinda loud..but thats ok; awkward touch controls
I've had this printer for 3 months now... So far, its performs as advertised and has a nice sleek black finish to boot. What I like most about this printer is the wireless printing; it doesn't need to be hooked up to my computer as long as its on the same wireless network, meaning it can be anywhere in the house and it prints right away after clicking "print." Another cool thing about it being wireless is you can print to it from smartphones without your comoputer even being on. It prints in color very nicely and it also has a scanner bed on top.
The thing I don't like about this printer is the touchsmart control buttons. When I first saw "touchsmart," I was thinking along the lines of touch ... screen. However the buttons are along the side of the navigation screen and are not quite touch screen and not quite buttons. They require pressure in order to be activated. Furtermore, one of the buttons seems to have a problem on my printer where I have to press with immense pressure in order for it to work.
Other than that, printer works great for the price. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fits my needs perfectly
Cons: Na
Very easy to set up, nice wireless bonus. Love being able to print from laptop and not have to go hook up first. Very nice product, pleased with performance and cost.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy printing - great photo quality
Cons: Wireless signal is poor
It's a great photo printer and everyday printing. Only issue is the wireless signal tends to drop a lot. Easy to set up.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I have had other HP printers in the past, but I have never had one as easy to set up and easy to use as this one! The only bad side to it is that I have had to turn it off and restart it once since I got it when the wireless connection lost signal. Looking at the larger picture, this is a small inconvenience compared to what I can do with this printer. Picture quality is amazing, scanned images are clear and crisp, and the Touchsmart technology is perfectly calibrated! I'm still playing with all of the features but I would recommend this printer to anyone for basic home use :-)

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The D110a printer is extremely easy to setup. Do not listen to the reviews that state that this printer can not be hooked up to a Wireless G network. That is completely untrue and it is extremely simple to hook it up to one. The quality of the print job is very good for the low price of the printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use
Cons: No fax
Extremely easy to setup, works like a charm. Scanning actually works (unlike the Canon printers) and gives you options for PDF, Jpeg, etc. right on the front panel.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Typical HP quality and HP concerns...
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality of the printouts
Cons: Cost and sheet count of the ink cartridges
All the features of the D110 worked amazingly well. The machine updated itself after finding the wireless network and connecting to it. Flawless. But, it was at the end of the life cycle for the black print cartridge that I discovered the typical HP philosophy when it came to ink cartridge replacements - you will pay through the nose for ink levels sufficient for your printing needs.
Although I did all of my printing in DRAFT mode, I still only got about half of the printings that HP said I would. The HP replacement cartridge that I then purchased lasted for 5 pages before it ran out.
So I went to the HP website to the customer care center. HP customer service was typical - a memoran ... dum response as if I had just walked in from high school, which acknowledged my problem but then gave me the cookie-cutter answer that did not address the situation.
Until HP learns to work with consumers on ink cartridge levels and costs, I would NOT recommend any HP printer despite the quality of the print... it's just too costly! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: A friend recommended this printer because of the sale price. Easy to install,Not one problem! A super deal! Prints excellent, and picture quality is not to bad as well.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: GREAT PRICE Set up easy just follow directions
Item.Review:
Pros: Price and features
Cons: maybe print speed but not really bad
I decided on this all in one printer first because of the price and OS compatibility. My expectations were not very high and just wanted something to print documents via wifi. I did not realize all the cool features this low price item had to offer, such as print from anywhere via email via smart phone or other PC/Mac. "This printer has its own email address"!!! When installing the printer I was expecting some complex set up for the wifi and driver installation for the computer. All you need to do is plug in the printer anywhere in your house and have your Wifi protected setup "WPS" ready. Follow the printers screen directions to the letter and your up and running. You must use the driver disc for you PC/Mac ... and follow the prompting directions also and your all set. "Leave your current anti-virus firewall setting and the driver disc will do everything for you"! Ink price is not that bad and I love the features this printer offers. Not bad for 54.11 with reward zone discount! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: easy wireless setup
Cons: Paper Jams often
I went with this HP beccause of the HP name, good price and wireless features. The print does look nice, BUT the paper jams once in a while.I took it back to get another one,and the same thing it jams.So i took it back for another brand. It was easy to set up and I felt good about it, but have been sadly dissapointed

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up and good price.
Cons: Speed ,no fast.
I bought this printer a few weeks ago and it works fine. It's easy to set up, clear copies, good colors,speed is aceptable. Ink is cheap. I loved it. Nothing bad so far.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup, great price, great quality
Cons: Media storage can be confusing to access
This printer is one of the best we have ever owned and we purchased it at such an affordable price. It has so much to offer and produces quality photos. I love the apps it has to offer (crossword puzzler daily printout, recipes, etc.) It was easy to install and setup on my wireless network. I would definitely buy it again!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, good value, good quality
Cons: Could hold more paper, and have a separate place for photo paper, but neither is critical.
After owning this printer for less than a week, I bought a second one as a gift. Super easy to set up. Prints well from my tower, laptop, iPad, and iPhone.
Love it!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This is a great deal for a small price and I love the ePrint function. So easy to setup and works without any problems. It's great to print right from my phone! If you want an ePrint solution this is a deal you can't pass up!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great price, easy to use
Cons: ink life too short
A very good printer for the price. The ink life is a little too short and the print speed is a little slow, but overall it is great for home use.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Prints from iPhone and iPad easily. Reasonable price.
Cons: I've seen better print Quality
I haven't had to use this a lot, but so far it's working great. I haven't tried any pictures yet, but printing text works good. I bought this primarily so I could print form my iPad and iPhone. It works just as expected. What is really cool, I can print to my house even when I'm not home. As long as you have Internet access, you can print. The set up didn't work as easily as the instructions said, but it wasn't bad. For some reason, the printer would not recognize my home network like it was supposed to. But after restarting the router and computer, it worked as planned. It took about 50-60 minutes to set up and that included setting up the new router I got too. Overall, very plea ... sed with this printers performance so far. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer for wireless once it works
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless!
Cons: Setup took a call to HP tech support
This printer was purchased as an immediate replacement for my Lexmark that died. The ink carts for this printer are very inexpensive compared to the Lexmark. The only issue I had was getting it to work with my Dlink wireless router. I call to HP tech support got it working in a few minutes. The printer does not like the router to be set for wireless N. I do not use this printer for photos only invoices and school papers. It is easy to set up for multiple laptops in the home.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I love my wireless All-in-One HP Photosmart Inkjet Printer
Item.Review:
Pros: fast; touch screen; versatility
Cons: can't think of one
If I buy a new electronic device it's usually because I have to,not just because I want to. Recently I wanted to upgrade my old printer to one that would print high quality photos, be easy to use and was wireless.
Wireless was a big selling point for me with this printer. It has a lot of features I didn't even know it had until I opened the box. Needless to say, I was very happy to see the extras I didn't bother really paying attention to. The printer was also under a hundred bucks!
When I got home, in less than twenty minutes I had the printer up and running. I've used the scanner more than I've used any scanner on any printer for the last 10 years. It's super easy. I can scan from 3 to 6 photos at ... once, drag them into the photo editing program that comes with the printer and separate them in a flash.
I have no wire mess to deal with, which is important. Also the paper reeving is at the bottom of the printer, instead of at the top so I don't worry about my paper getting bent. Printing is super fast and I love that the ink for color and black comes in one contained cartridge, instead of two or three.
This is the best All-In-One printer that HP makes and the best I've owned in ages. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Printer seems to be great for the price. Easy to unpack and set up but programming the Wireless feature was difficult. It took reading the directions several times to understand them. The photo print quality is just great. Overall, great printer for the price.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I had a lot of trouble with a previous HP All-In-One. I took a gamble on another. The reviews for this one were pretty good and the price was right. After a month of using it, I am VERY pleased. The only con I can think of is the time it took to download the software when I was setting it up. However, now that it is up and running, everything is good to go. Scans show up crystal clear, printing is easy and top quality.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Features, easy setup, great price for printer and cartridge
Cons: Print catch tray
I have owned this printer for about 3 months now. I picked it up on sale for $70. This printer has exceeded my expectations.
I researched the market and like HP the best. The print heads are on the cartridge, which means if they get clogged you purchase a new cartridge (not a new printer). I also like this model better than the more expensive HP models. I tried them out in the Best Buy store and this one performed better than the rest. Picture quality is great. Speed is great. Also, the printer will continue to print after the "cartridge low" indicator - which prevents you from throwing out a cartridge that still has ink in it (unlike other brands).
Wireless connectivity was ... a snap with my router as the printer was compatible with the "quick security setup" button. I installed the printer and software and was printing in about 40 minutes from taking it out of the box.
Printing features are excellent - as the software will allow you to save paper and ink easily by printing many pages on the same one. Double sided printing is a snap - just click on double sided printing button and follow the detailed pictures on the screen to print exactly as you want. There is also a gadget for Windows 7 and Vista users that works well for dragging pictures and printing quickly.
This printer comes with an email address, which is nice for printing to it from anywhere just by sending it an email. This feature responds almost as quick as printing from the normal wireless connection. It also has a USB port incase you want to do wired printing.
It also has the ability to connect to hp applications without a computer - which is really neat. Kids content is excellent, things like coloring pages, daily reading and crosswords, and activities. There are also some nice apps for adults; sudoku, news, coupons, and weekly menus to name a few. You setup the time for it to print and the printer automatically prints the content when you want (or on request).
My only negative comment so far is t ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: HP Photosmart D110a All-in-One InkJet Printer does the job
Item.Review: HP Photosmart D110a All-in-One InkJet Printer does the job. After opening the package, I was very impressed it has a very beautiful design and goes with the nice newly furnished office. The first time I had it turned on, it gave me some trouble turning it on. But the 2nd time it works. Setup was easy. - I just had to push the key on my router and the printer did all the work to set perfectly. The print quality is amazing. I now realize what I've been missing! I love the fact that you can email documents right to your printer. It also comes with a memory card slot - not sure I'll use it, but you never know! The quick printing is incredible. This is a nice home printer too, especially if you have kids and don't want to have a printer for each, or if you have both desktops and no ... tebook computers. Overall you get what you pay for, but I this printer for a very good price with coupons, and it is energy efficient. I recommend this. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: For the price, it does a good job.
Item.Review:
Pros: simple set up, inexpensive
Cons: the printed page tray --- there isn't one, photo print colors are disappointing
My HP Photosmart (at least 10yrs old) died during a printing project and I purchased this little guy in a rush. For the print jobs I do this is an inexpensive workhorse. I LOVE the wireless connections with remote printing. The user interface is very intuitive and the on screen computer instruction options are nice.
I clicked "no" on the recommend to a friend because it would totally depend on what they wanted in a printer.... for photos, no....for regular print jobs, it is fast, clear, quiet, and it scans.
However, I do enjoy printing my photos and I am dissatisfied with the color in limited adjustments for photo printing.
Beware of the ... lower priced print cartridges -- they don't print a lot of copies... price per page is actually higher. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Very simple setup, great print quality, wireless capabilities.
The ease of use and setup makes this wireless printer a great value. Considering my household has multiple computers printing from the same printer, going wireless was an easy decision. The speed of which the printer receives and prints met my expectations, and the touch screen operations for setup and scanning are very straight forward. The printer also looks great aesthetically. I've owned multiple HP products in the past, and this printer delivered great value for the price.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, great price
This is a sharp looking printer. Wireless printing flawless. Easy setup, great price too. A plus for me, it's compatible with AirPrint. Good buy.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: speed, quietness, print quality
Cons: unable to enlarge documents and print quality
i had a problem in setting this up so i called tech support. they were extremely helpful and did the complete setup quickly. contrary to some other reviews, i found the it does not eat ink and it is very quiet. the only cons are that you cannot copy a document and enlarge it, and the when printing pictures the color quality is poor.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything!
I got this printer for Christmas for the family and I'm very pleased. Setup was quick and easy. I was able to connect both of our laptops quickly and was printing out photos that looked amazing. I've been leary of printing photos from the printer because I didn't think the quality would be that good but I was wrong. They came out just as good as photos I've had done through snapfish. I'm very picky about my electronics and I thought the price was too good to be true but it was a great buy. I would highly recommend this to anyone!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great print quality, good price, easy set up
Cons: It comes in the Energy Save Mode and the average person would not know how to change the settings.
This printer prints photos of extremely high quality. I'm very happy with it. When I set it all up, everything worked fine, but when I turned it off and wanted to use it again, it was in power save mode. I contacted HP's customer support and they were more than helpful explaining that you have to go into Setup Mode, then to Preferences, then to Energy Save Mode and click Off. If you don't do this, you will have to unplug and plug the computer back in each time you want to use it. Like I said, this is a great little printer and I am giving out this information to anyone who might encounter a problem with the Energy Save Mod ... e. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: When I read all the printer capabilities listed for such a low price I was a little suspicious but I was pleasantly surprised. The printer setup & the installation on HP protable went flawlessly. There was one hitch with my wife's MAC PRO portable. The MAC did not see the scanner but that was fixed with one phone call to HP Customer Support by a MAC software upgate. I am pleased to say that all of the advertised capabilities work as stated. I have bought a 2nd one for my daughter for Chrismas. I do not beleive that you will be disappointed if you too should purchase this printer. Highly Recommended!!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this printer one week ago; it replaced another hp printer that had developed problems but was still in warranty. This model is simply excellent. The USB set-up was straight-forward and easy to install. Had an issue connecting it to my wireless laptop, but their tech support person resolved the problem over the phone. I can't say enough about their customer service and tech support. Shipping was fast. No question about getting the replacement. They far exceeded my expectations! Noise is not a problem. The quality of photo printing is great. I would highly recommend this printer to anyone and will definitely continue to use hp products. They can't be beat.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Size, east of setup, price and refill cartridges
Cons: no comment
I buy lots of printers and this is my latest purchase. I like its smaller size than other printers, the ease of use, wireless capability and refillable cartridges. I've owned it for almost a month and am for now, quite happy with this printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, touch screen, easy set up, wireless.
Cons: Photo print quality very poor.
Good printer for the price, this is my second HP printer, the first one died after only 2 1/2 years with minimal use, so why did I buy another HP product? Price, features, I know how to use them. The other printers I looked at the ink was too high or the printer was. Now days products are not made to last people want the latest and greatest, so why make something that's going to last when it's going to be out dated next year? Bottom line: I bought one for my mom than a week later bought one for myself. There cheap now 100.00. easy to set up, great touch screen and it's wireless. The bad: very poor photo printing. Hope this helps. S.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I purchased this printer with a new HP DV6Z computer. I found it easy to set-up with great picture quality. The price was right and I don't usually print at home anyway as printing on work computers is much cheaper. It sounds like a train wreck when you power it up from start but don't let that bother you. Overall good printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: This is my first wireless printer and I love it!
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, wireless feature, ease of use
Cons: Energy Star feature causes wireless to go offline
I bought this printer to replace an older HP All-In-One printer. Setup on the two laptops and a netbook was a breeze. The print/scan quality is great.
Pros: 1) Besides quality, the wireless feature is the best feature. I no longer have to use the USB connection to print or scan. So far, I have mostly used the scanner and the only time I have to get out of my chair is to put in new pictures. 2) There are a few apps that can be installed on the printer. We have used the coupon app and was able to print out some great coupons before we went grocery shopping. 3) Price! When I bought the printer, it was on sale for $99.99 and I also used a $10 Reward Zone coupon.
... Cons: 1) Energy Star Feature - For some reason when the printer went into sleep mode, the printer went offline wirelessly. I disabled Energy Star and it hasn't fell offline yet. 2) The first couple pages printed had a few blank spots. I guess it was just the ink cartridge. After a couple pages, the printed pages now look great. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: price, wireless
Easy to setup. Time consuming but easy. I have three computer that print wirelessly to this printer. None have problems conecting. Very fast and efficient. Well worth the price.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, Great price.
This printer is fast and quiet, the colors are true. I love the wireless feature, it has great range. It was easy to set up and and is easy to use. We have had this printer for about a month and have had no problems.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy setup and great print quality
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy wireless set up, good price
I got this as a replacement for a C4795 I had to return as defective. What a difference! The wireless setup worked right the first time. It found my WAP and connected to it without complaint. The Windows 7 software installed without a hitch and made it easy to discover the networked printer and set it up. Under Ubuntu Linux 10.04, I went ahead and installed the latest version of HPLIP which has explicit support for this model. Ubuntu also makes it easy to discover a networked printer and set it up.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Low cost/ease of use
Cons: Not for high qualty prints but what so you expect at this price?
We needed a wireless printer not only to use with our in-home PC, but to also allow us to print from our iPhones and iPad. This printer is easy and fast to setup and use. It fits our need. It is also nice to be able to print documents to our home printer from any where you have internet access using HP's eprint. All of this for a low cost printer with all needed software included.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Difficult setup. Good print quality for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: Setup
It took me about 4 hours to get this setup on our wireless network. It wasn't hard to do but I had to run and re run the setup wizards and enter network passwords repeatedly however now that it's up and running it prints beautiful photos.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Does everything I expected it to do...
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless printing great/so is price
Cons: no bad features
It even connects to my iPhone so I can print pictures from it. Prints good quality photos and color, too. Not top of the line with speed, but great for home use...very satisfied with it. Delivered on time by BestBuy.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price and efficiency
Cons: Basic features and noise
The printer is fast and efficient. It is noisy. Sometimes the paper gets stuck but is easy to remove. Good printer for the price.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice HP for a tight budget
Item.Review:
Pros: Printing, Photos, eprint
Cons: software for scanning in wireless mode.
Was easy to set up at first just for printing. Worked great. Then I tried to "scan". I have had to uninstall and re-install software numerous times and it still doesn't work right wirelessly. Print, yes, Scan, no. I still hope to get it "fixed" eventually, because otherwise I'm quite happy with quality and other features.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Not worth what you pay for it.
I had expected it to be easy to set this thing up (model D-110a), but all I got was error messages, whether attempting wireless or wired setup. I am not an expert but I can usually install device software. Each "fix" as suggested by HP would just result in a different error message. Ultimately I paid the Geek Squad $30 to set it up for me, wired. They told me the problem was a defective installation CD. The Geek Squad people were very knowledgeable and helpful, but it upsets me that I had to pay an extra $30 because of a defective product. Beware - If there was one defective disk, there are probably a lot more. I would avoid this model.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: price, quality of print, easy to install
Cons: not any so far
I found this all in one printer to be so easy to set up. I was thoroughly surprised by how easy both installment and set up was for me. I am not the most advanced in techology; however, you just follow the on screen instructions and you cannot go wrong. I absolutely love this product for the quality and the price I paid for it ---is icing on the cake.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Bad Tech Support for odd problem
Item.Review:
Pros: Cheap
Cons: Tech support and didn't print
Bought the printer for home use to print color and b&w but not for photos. After less than three days of use the printer seemed to stop touching the paper. Both the ink cartridges showed full, and the diagnostics were good. It just printed blank pages, which defeated the point of having a printer. Tech support said to buy new $60 cartridges, so I brought it back and got a Kodak printer, which has the cheapest cartridges in the industry.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great for a student: easy to set up & quick
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast, easy to use
I love this printer. I had a canon pixma mp500 before and this HP is much more expressive. I have a mac and it was easy to setup. It prints quickly. The only thing I need to adjust is setting it up to multiple routers so that it prints on any network. Love it!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Full featured at good price
Cons: Front loading paper feed instead of top loading
Simple setup, good quality, and great price. There is very little to complain about from my perspective.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: We received this printer a day early. Very fast service. Easy to install for us old people. good quality print. Works great wireless with my laptop. scans good. A little slow booting up if you keep it turned off when not using like I do. Definitely recommend. Got it at a good price too. Will definitely order directly from HP again.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great product for a great price!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy set up, great wireless range
Cons: None yet
I bought it for my son's family. They were so pleased with it. Easy to set up and connect wirelessly. They are also pleased with the print quality and the photos it prints.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless features
Cons: Page output catch
I chose this printer for home use after doing a LOT of online comparison shopping. Based on that research, the HP60 cartridges this printer uses should provide the most bang for the buck, especially the XL cartridges (one of the lowest $/page, including color, among inkjets).
Installation was fairly easy, though it took about a half hour. I've now had this printer for a couple months. Haven't done an enormous amount of printing, but the print quality is great. I love the wireless feature -- I'm able to take my laptop anywhere in the house and print. You can also set up this printer to manage it and print to it online, from remote locations, which I've done.
The size of the printer is good, not too big. The plastic ... panel that extends out to catch pages comes out a bit far, but even so, I've still had pages shoot out and fall on the floor. That's probably the only quirk I have with it thus far. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This printer is a good value for limited use. Have not been able to keep it working in the wireless mode but works so far with a cable connection. It matters not to me, as long as it works.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The printer was not easy to install wireless or USB. They had to do it by remote. Customer service is great which makes up for the average product. There is to much bloat in the software, noisy and doesn't work with Microsoft Works 2004. This should have been on the box and I would not have purchased this product. At first paper jammed but I was told to change to the 96 brightness and that took care of the problem. It has a lot of features but I have a printer that is 7 years old and it works better and doesn't take the mb of the hp. Old one 45.25MB, HP 260.44 MB. It is to late to return now as it has been 2 weeks otherwise I would look for something that was less problematic. I will just use this for the wireless laptop. Don't get me wrong it has a lot of nice things but I wanted somethin ... g that worked well with XP also. Pictures turn out good. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Installation is not easiest; printer is worth it
Item.Review:
Pros: wireless does not have to be on the desk
Cons: set up
I had an IT guy from across the street help me with installation and even he was scratching his head. After set up was complete it is easy to use and gives good colors.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: wireless printing at a good price
Cons: scanner saving wirelessly.
This was fairly easy to set up. Almost a plug and play. I wasn't able to get the scanner to save to my computer so I use the SD card slot and transfer manually. Kind of a pain, but there is no support for the problem that I can find. That's another thing, very limited support.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to install, good price, good print quality
This printer was easy to install and it has worked perfectly since we purchased it. The print quality on the printer is fantastic and the wireless feature has been great!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Replaced a the 3050A Deskjet returned a week ago with this printer. It is just what I wanted: quiet, bottom paper feed, no extraneous touchpad buttons, print quality mode can be changed, and just all around easy to use. Install was a breeze. This is just what I was looking for.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: The size and options for the price
Cons: having to replace ink so often
Very happy with our purchase at the moment. We will see how long the machine lasts.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless, Color printing, Good quality
Cons: No complaints
I'm happy with my purchase. The printer is working well. It was a straight forward setup process. Takes a little bit of time only because there are a few steps to the setup with it being wireless.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price, nice features, compact
Cons: One-touch wifi set-up isn't really one-touch
Great 3 in 1 color printer for the price! It scans, copies, and prints, and it does print photographs too. I absolutely love the fact that I can e-mail my documents to my printer from all the way across town, and they'll print out at home. I don't even have to be hooked up to my wireless network.
The only thing I had a little problem with was the one-touch wireless setup. For some reason it didn't work right, and I futzed around with my wireless modem and the printer for ages until it finally connected. I have no idea why it wasn't working or what made it work, but it works fine now. It just took a little more patience than I would have liked.
Also, when you print it is a ... little on the noisy side, and it does take a second for the pages to go through.
Aside from that, the ink cartridges are pretty reasonably priced. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT
Item.Review:
Pros: great price, good quality print, easy set up
Cons: have not found any problems at all.
I am Very satisfied with my new printer. For the price, it prints great pictures and text. The print quality is very clear and precise, even if a photo is printed on plain paper instead of photo paper. the color is also very true and I am so glad I chose this printer .

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Small, efficient, good quality photo prints, great price
Cons: Setup instructions caused problem with linksys router--don't use WPS router button despite HP directions
Installation is touted as simple and easy. It mostly is; however it has taken all my evening due to the fact that the HP setup instruction says to press the WPS button on the router for easy setup. This "worked" but DO NOT press the WPS button if you have a linksys e 1550 purchased from best buy. Pressing WPS resets the settings and security on the router, will shut down your internet connectivity, and HP will act as if they are completely unaware of this situation. They offer no assistance and will only refer you to the router vendor. Inexcusable that they would not even own up to knowing that this somet ... imes occurs when Linksys is one of the top when it comes to router sales. They should not advise to press the WPS button without a warning. You can still do set up easily (after completely resetting the router and starting over) but you do not want to do it using WPS button. You want to go to the Wireless program on the Printer display screen and use the Setup wizard and then manually enter the router network or SSID and your WPA password. Then everything goes smooth--but after offering faulty or incomplete instructions, HP will offer no advice to even help you get on the right track after your router settings have been reset thanks to their instructions. It is no wonder that I see major online complaints about HP customer service. Too bad, since the product seems to be another good one. (My 3rd HP printer) expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I recently bought this Hp photosmart printer and it is the best investment I have made!!!! It prints quickly and with the best quality. Setup for the printer was simiple and I was finished with it in no time!!! The best part about this printer is that it's wireless!! I was dreading getting a printer because of all the extra cords I was going to have to deal with but with this printer it's just one cord. Also, the combo scanner and copier has helped me tremedously!!! I would recomend this 3-in-one printer to anyone who needs something more than just a copier!! It was a great purchase and I definitely will stick with Hp for everything!!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
Cons: nothing
All I can say is that you will not regret buying this printer, super easy to set up, eprint, webprint, and wireless print. for the price its a steal!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer for an awesome price!
Item.Review:
Pros: Great price, functions like eprint and airprint, quiet
I bought this online today and did a store pick-up. I had everything set-up in no time, all computers in the house and my iPhone connected wirelessly! The photo quality is really great, I tried it out by printing a picture directly from my iPhone. I got this on sale, $40.00 off; could not find a better deal, especially with the functions and print quality on this AIO. As others have mentioned, you do want to connect your printer initially to get the updates before going wireless...other than that it's easy as 1 2 3. So far I LOVE this printer!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: The footprint for the multiple funtions.
All good experience so far. I appreciate wireless connectivity. I like the good print speed. I look forward to exploiting more of the functions.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I looked at many computers and just could not decide which one to purchase. I am so glad I purchased this one. When I received this printer, thankfully it was very easy to set up. The photos printed from this computer are amazing. I have never seen such quality pictures. The documents are perfect a nice black ink. It has excellent features. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Great printer, scanner, and copier for the price. Was easy to set up and wireless is a great feature. HP ePrint is a nice feature as it allows visitors to print with their deivces without having to do any setup procedures provided they have an internet connection and can send email.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Couldn't get the software loaded onto my laptop. Use the troubleshooting website, but that proved unsuccessful, because I could not print any info off the Internet. Per my computer screen, the printer was offline. I tried several times to uninstall and reinstall the software. I even called tech support. He offered to log onto my computer, but I declined. I should be able to install the printer and software using the instructions that were provided without anyone remotely logging onto my computer. I am in the process of return my printer. I am very disappointed. I should have known there would be problem, because the computer that I ordered for my niece's graduation party was several weeks late. HP needs to QC its products and their instructions.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Well I will start off with yes the printer is easy to setup. I was able to print the test page and everything no problem but after I tried to print out my first report for college..it either somehow manage to completely destroy the paper or continuously give me errors. I had went online to see if anyone else are having these problems but most say that you have to reset it. I don't know about you but I do not want to keep resetting it every time I get a error message (which is frequently) this the second printer I have bought form HP that did not work well. I just might have to send it back if I cannot get it to work properly

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything.. simply love it!
Cons: Nothing so far..
This printer is simply awesome for me. It works great according to my needs. It prints really fast to my amazement. As far as picture printing quality i think it is great as well. I have no problems with it. ... and especially for the price that I bought for $69.99 it fit great with my budget. The only thing is that i thought the screen was going to be touch screen and it's not. You gotta use the arrows to get to your selection other than that all is well :D ...!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy set-up, online features.
Cons: Difficult to clear the occasional paper jam.
I'm really pleased with my new HP printer. The wireless setup was stress free. The online features are nice, particularly for things for the kids. The scanning to PDF doc works fantastic as well. I'm very pleased with the product. Thank you Joey (at Tuttle Store) for directing me to it.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless / Email to print!!
Picked this for my package deal with my Toshiba laptop. Love the wireless!!! Never will I ever buy another without it. Also gotta have the email to print feature. I can take a picture with my smart phone and send it to an email address that I setup and it's sitting on my printer when I get home. Speedy enough scanner, good quality scans. Very happy with my selection. Havn't tried photo printing yet.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up and use
Cons: No issues for the price
Excellent all in one wireless printer, scanner and copier for the price. We use it from many rooms to wirelessly print and scan business and personal documentation.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This printer/fax/scanner was just what I wanted and bought it immediately when I saw it on sale. Great features at an affordable price and I'm very happy with my purchase. Scans perfectly and the colors are fantastic.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Looks cool
Cons: Ink guzzling, Paper jamming
So here's the deal. I owned a 3-in-1 HP printer that lasted over 5 years and had no issues at all until it died 2 weeks ago. Because of the longevity of my last printer, I felt good about a new HP printer. Bad idea.
In a little over a week, I've almost thrown the new printer out because of the pain it is. I'm not sure if this is a scam or not, but the use of Fast Draft to conserve ink leads to horrible paper jams and pulling in as many as 6 sheets of paper at once. On top of it, I've printed about 10 documents (maybe 80 pages total), and both ink cartridges are now depleted.
Unimpressed HP. Unimpressed.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice printer quality for the price.
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price, easy to use, very good print quality.
Cons: I haven't found anything yet. My only complaint may be how soon I will need to replace ink cartridges.
Has a very good print quality. Nice easy touch screen that makes changes very easy. Price of ink cartridges is fairly well priced. Very good printer overall. We are very pleased with our new HP Photosmart purchase.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great value, easy set up
Cons: no fax feature
This printer is an awesome value for the money. The quality and speed is impressive, and it is very easy to set up-especially the wireless/network set-up. However the only drawback is that there is no ability to fax.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to setup and use.
Cons: kids will probably break it in a month..lol
If your looking for a simple printer w/ plenty of options and wireless capabilities then I wouldn't recommend spending more money on any other printer. I use primarily for printing online receipts and normal documents..etc.. Color, Speed, and WiFi all 10 for 10 on my scale!! Highly Recommended!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Simple to operate and reasonably priced
Cons: Better quality and more functions!
When shopping for a printer I was confused with all the choices. I didn't want to spend a ton of money since my needs aren't as great as if it was being used for a business. I had an HP Printer in the past and was always satisfied with it's performance. It just so happened that I caught a sale on this one. I was sceptical at first because it was so reasonably priced. I took a chance and purchased it and have not been sorry. It's not the top of the line, but does what I need it to do. Great printer for the money!!!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great print, no sweat operation, lovely photo prints
Cons: Slow photo printing at 400pix, but what do you expect of a $60 printer.
I bought this printer by accident. I wanted the more expensive Premier (at $149) and this box was under it so I grabbed this lower priced ($69) model by accident. (The Premier was out of stock.) I needed to replace an HP4500 I'd bought 10 days earlier. The HP4500 couldn't align cartridges because its scanning function was faulty and it could only shred paper rather than print on it. I didn't realize until I got it home that during the exchange process the box I'd grabbed contained the wrong printer. This one functions beautifully, has a smaller footprint inside my printer cabinet and as a bonus, prints lovely photos. I can't imagine what the ... Premier does any better for $80 extra. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Setup easy and works great @ great price
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup, great quality, at a great price
I bought this as a replacement to my older HP printer. Very happy with purchase. Really enjoy the wireless elements of it, along with the ability to direct print to the printer through a unique address.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of setup & print quality
Cons: slow printing
Really needed the scanner more than the printer but got a whole lot more than I thought I'd get. Wireless setup easily in just a few minutes. Pretty much self configuring! Scanner & print functions are good but be forewarned, the printer is on the slow side but the print quality is good. An added bonus was when I was able to print wirelessly from my iPhone! Overall just a great value if you are not a high volume user.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: couldnt get wireless printing to work with FIOS
Item.Review:
Cons: connecting to wireless network
Bought this for printing from IPAD as HP printers only ones listed by Apple. As an all in one printer its probably good if you dont care about wireless printing. I spent 3 days trying to get it work - enough, its going back. There are plenty of suggestions on forums/help but you shouldnt have to go through 20 steps and reconfig you router for this stupid printer and it may still not work. I bought a Kodak printer for my daughter - similar price, features ,plugged it in, found the network, entered the security and it was up and running in seconds. Meanwhile this HP sits there and cant connect to network . I also didnt like the user interface on the small 2 in screen.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Perfect wireless printer for someone on a budget
Item.Review:
Pros: It works like it should! Super easy to set up.
Cons: Nothing so far
This is a great printer for a reasonable price. Works perfectly with AirPrint for iPhone and iPad. It also works perfectly with my Macbook. It's wonderful to be able to just press print and hear the printer start working. Took ten minutes to set up couldn't have been any easier. Perfect accessory for your new your new apple device! Eprint is another great feature. You can email directly to your printer from anywhere and a document is printed when you come home.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I needed to replace my ageing printer and wanted wireless. I looked into the D110a and thought it would work well (as all of my HP printers have). Very easy to install, hp eprinting is fantasic and now I can print from my Touchpad along wih my Linux Acer laptop and windows desktop. Printing never got easier and all you have to do is setup your D110A at HP's eprint.com website, create an email address to print to and wah lah!!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing
Cons: wireless
This printer claims to be a wireless printer yet it will not stayed connected to a secure network. I have spent HOURS on the phone with HP tech support and they were not able to help. It makes zero sense that I would need to type my password in my printer every time I want to print. Difficult setup, I am pretty tech savy and had difficulties running this printer. do not buy

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The D110a sounds like the best of all worlds put in one little package. However, it is far from being the best at any of its many features. The wireless does not connect with any of the 3 different iMac's in my household. It connects to the router about 1 in 10 attempts but from there just disconnects without an explanation. There is also the issue of having to clean the printer heads after each use. No other printer I have Ever used has had that requirement. The design of the printer itself makes cleaning jammed paper almost impossible, which has happened on several occasions. Finally, the paper feed does not always catch the paper in the tray, regardless of the amount of paper in the tray. The user should never have to manually push paper into a printer. I got this in late 2010, I expect ... ed more from such a well known brand. The website does not have a very good customer service section and I was unable to find solutions to my problem. Needless to say I am extremely unsatisfied and will not be purchasing another HP anything, anytime soon. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I am really impressed with the speed and quality of photos with this machine.
