The price is quite reasonable, and with the wireless/bluetooth component, it is a great addition to those with laptops. The negative that I have noticed is that my desktop (old XP model) that is wired to the printer, won't print checks or reports from Quicken 2011? I had to load the program onto my laptop and print wirelessly. It doesn't make any sense, and I have no idea if it's a Quicken problem (probably) or a printer issue. Other programs, such as Word, Excel, print OK on this. Ink is reasonably priced, but I haven't used/had it long enough to know if it is an ink hog like my Canon used to be.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: simple to set up, good price, easy to use
I bought this device to replace my archaic HP from about 6 years ago. It does a fantastic job! I was looking for something very user friendly (as I'm not the only one that would use it) and with the touch screen choices, it definitely meets my expectations. It was very easy to set up on my wireless network as well. I'm very pleased with this all in one.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
This has been the best printer I have bought. It prints fast and very readable. I use it for work and school. It is a great buy for the money. The ink cartridges are very affordable also and easy to put in. The printer was very easy to set up and works like a charm.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: yes, it is loud and yes, it doesn't have a tray to catch the outgoing printed papers so the paper just falls onto the tray full of the blank paper feeding into the machine. However, it's an excellent basic printer for low volume home use. It is slower but if you don't print a lot, you don't need a lot of machine. This is an excellent value for the price. The touch keypad is easy to understand and very intuitive. The set-up was very easy and I am just a homemaker, not a tech person. The printer itself walks you through the wireless set-up so by the time you get to the installation CD on your computer, half the work is already done and it goes by smoothly. You do need to know what a wep-key is, but that number is ususaly printed right on your wireless router and clearly labelled.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This has been a nice printer for in-home use. the print is nice and picture quality is good. The only thing I have had problems with is the printer jams all the time. I don't know why it keeps jamming and it's difficult to clear the path.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
I have found this to be a great home office PC purchase for the price. Set-up was fairly simple except getting the unit to accept the ink cartridges, after some adjustment it was fine. The e-print feature using the printers own e-mail address is fantastic for me.
The wireless set-up has been great as well as the scanning ability back to my PC. Copy and print speed seem to be quIck as well with good image result.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great buy for the price. Love the wireless conn!
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless features
Cons: Size...
Before buying our printer we focused on supplies (cartridges) prices. HP and EPSON got very good and affordable prices... The decision was made.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Jack of all trades and master of none
Item.Review:
Pros: It is small and cheap.
Cons: Difficult to set up and harder to use.
I bought this because I needed a scanner. That is all I wanted since I have a Xerox Color Laser for printing that is 10 times faster and much prettier. Like every "all-in-one" I have ever owned and I have owned about 4 of them counting this one, it does everything but it does nothing well. It is difficult to use, and difficult to set up. I took it back and got a refund and ordered an HP scanner on line. Should you buy one of these? Only if you have no space. That is the only reason to even consider one. Or if you have very little money and are willing to deal with a difficult to use and install piece of gear.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good printer for the money, not good for routers
Item.Review:
Pros: Print quality, price
Cons: Connecting to router
Print quality is excellent, especially for the cost. Cartridges do not last long. Not easy to connect to router or for use by those on network (3 computers).

Item.Item: HP Photosmart E-All-in-One D110a Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: price, quality, speed
Cons: nothing yet
i was impressed immediately with the quality and speed of this printer. we use it mostly for documents, but the photo quality was impressive.
